channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Activist hedge fund Elliott bets $1 billion on British platinum producer
item.description: The activist hedge fund led by Paul Singer has exposure to almost 33.6 million Anglo American shares via derivatives, per a filing.

item.title: All the data so far is showing inflation isn't going away, and is making things tough on the Fed
item.description: The last batch of inflation news that Federal Reserve officials will see before their meeting next week is in, and none of it is very good.

item.title: Pottery Barn parent Williams-Sonoma fined for marketing its furniture as 'crafted' in the U.S. when it was actually made in China
item.description: In addition to paying a penalty, the company will be required to submit annual compliance reports, the FTC said.

item.title: Dividend stocks are poised to outperform, says Bank of America. Here are names on its list
item.description: History shows in this economic environment, dividend stocks have led the way higher a majority of the time, Bank of America's Savita Subramanian said.

item.title: Philadelphia-based Republic Bank implodes in first failure of the year
item.description: Republic First Bank had roughly $6 billion in assets and $4 billion in deposits as of Jan. 31.

item.title: American Airlines cuts some international flights into 2025, citing Boeing delivery delays
item.description: American is the latest carrier to tweak its growth plan, citing late-arriving planes from Boeing.

item.title: The top 5 books these mental health experts say will help you combat burnout at work and build healthy habits
item.description: What to read when you're feeling overwhelmed at work.

item.title: Federal regulator finds Tesla Autopilot has 'critical safety gap' linked to hundreds of collisions
item.description: Federal authorities say a "critical safety gap" in Tesla's Autopilot system contributed to at least 467 collisions, 13 resulting in fatalities.

item.title: Billionaire Miami Dolphins owner wants South Florida to be more like Manhattan—'I still love a challenge'
item.description: “I want to make West Palm a model city for the country," said Related Cos. founder, Stephen Ross.

item.title: Intel used to dominate the U.S. chip industry. Now it's struggling to stay relevant
item.description: Intel has missed most of the significant technology transitions over the past 15-plus years, losing its standing in the chip industry along the way.
